sentence.Network_en: An active and expansive market economy is a necessary condition for progress.
sentence.Network_cn: 积极扩张的市场经济是发展的必要条件。

sentence.Network_en: The premier was in expansive mood.
They have played an expansive style of rugby.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们采用向外展开打法打了一场橄榄球。

entry.def: If something is expansive, it covers or includes a large area or many things.

example.ex: They have played an expansive style of rugby.
example.tran: 他们采用向外展开打法打了一场橄榄球。

entry.def: If you are expansive, you talk a lot, or are friendly or generous, because you are feeling happy and relaxed.

example.ex: He was becoming more expansive as he relaxed...
example.tran: 他放松的时候变得更加开朗。

example.ex: The premier was in expansive mood.

entry.def: If you describe something such as a period of time or an economy as expansive, you mean that it is associated with growth or expansion.

example.ex: An active and expansive market economy is a necessary condition for progress.
example.tran: 积极扩张的市场经济是发展的必要条件。

means.word_mean: 1. able or tending to expand or characterized by expansion;
3. marked by exaggerated feelings of euphoria and delusions of grandeur
4. friendly and open and willing to talk;

auth_sentence.content: Ultimately this album is as expansive as its title.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ultimately this album is as expansive as its title.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ultimately this album is as expansive as its title.

auth_sentence.content: Boies and Olson are happy with this expansive approach.
auth_sentence.res_content: Boies and Olson are happy with this expansive approach.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Boies and Olson are happy with this expansive approach.

auth_sentence.content: Fiction is a liberating and expansive form for me.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fiction is a liberating and expansive form for me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fiction is a liberating and expansive form for me.

means.word_mean: 可扩大的, 可扩展的;广阔的;胸襟开阔的, 开朗的

sentences.en: The father was in an expansive mood and gave presents to all of his children.
sentences.cn: 他们的父亲心情很好, 给每个孩子都送了礼物。
